title: MASTER the 5 KEY NEW FEATURES in Civ 7! - Civilization 7 Guide
description:
Civilization 7 can be a complex 4X strategy game, with many changes over its predecessor. Right from the game setup, leader & civ selection Civ 7 is different. In this guide I'll discuss starting a game, city & town development, technological mastery, commanders, diplomacy & influence, and new age priorities. Everything from legacy points to rural tiles, from towns to age-wide goals, welcome to my first Civ 7 tips/ tutorial video!

TIMECARDS
0:00 - Civilization 7 Best Start Beginners Guide
0:12 - 1. STARTING A GAME
0:48 - Civ Selection & Setup
1:39 - 2. CITY GROWTH AND EXPANSION
2:20 - Growth 101 & Rural Tiles
3:00 - Ageless Buildings
3:48 - Urban Tiles & Adjacency Bonuses
5:15 - 3. TOWNS AND TECHS
5:45 - Tech and Civic Mastery
6:38 - Town Specialization
7:53 - 4. WAR & COMBAT
8:00 - Commanders
8:33 - Diplomatic Relationships
9:07 - Influence
10:00 - Fortified Districts & Walls
10:47 - 5. NEW AGE THINKING
11:47 - Crisis Events
12:37 - Age Transition
14:00 - Picking Legacy Rewards
15:37 - New Features, Distant Lands
16:43 - Yields and Specialization
17:15 - CONCLUSIONS



SUPPORTS:

title: Civ 7 | Pitfalls, Lessons, New Player Guide – Watch This Before Playing! (Civilization VII Gameplay)
description:
ACTUAL Civ 7 gameplay! I’ll be taking you through beginners tips in your very first game of Civilization Seven. What are the pitfalls that strike new players? What lessons can I give you before you play your first game? This is my new antiquity player guide with Augustus – watch this before your first playthrough of Civ VII!

We talk about everything from settlements, towns, cities, districts, quarters, buildings, improvements, techs, yields, civics, leaders, civilizations, tactics, pantheons, strategy, military, science, culture, gold, economy, production… Trust me, you want to watch this video!!!

title: Beginner Mistakes to AVOID in Civ 7
description:
Don’t make these Civilization 7 beginner mistakes! The new Civilization game is here, and whether you’re familiar with the Civ games or brand new to 4X strategy games, there are lots of new Civ 7 systems to get to grips with as you dive into some Civ 7 gameplay. We’re here to help you avoid these missteps as you embark on your Civ 7 playthrough. From healing and upgrading your Civ 7 units to managing your Civ 7 resources and setting up Civ 7 trade routes, here are some handy Civ 7 tips to help you get started.  

00:00 - Intro
00:35 - Civ 7 Fog
01:10 - Civ 7 Settlement Cap
01:52 - Civ 7 Resources
02:28 - Civ 7 Landlocked
03:15 - Civ 7 Hostile Independent People
04:43 - Civ 7 Commanders
05:39 - Civ 7 Heal and Upgrade Units
06:27 - Civ 7 Repair Districts and Civ 7 Gold
07:13 - Civ 7 Unique Districts
07:47 - Civ 7 Influence
08:03 - Civ 7 Progress
08:30 - Civ 7 Trade Routes
08:51 - Civ 7 Age Progress
09:54 - Civ 7 Military

Civilization 7 is out now in Early Access, with its full release on February 11, 2025.

title: Civilization 7: Don't Make These 14 Mistakes!
description:
Don't make these mistakes in Civ 7! Whether you’re a Civilization veteran or totally new to 4X games, there are plenty of new Civ 7 systems to learn. Leading a nation to victory is no easy task, and a Civ game isn’t exactly quick, so make sure to avoid these 14 crucial pitfalls in Civilization 7. From Civ 7 resource management, to dealing with hostile independents, and more, check out our Civ 7 guide filled with lots of helpful Civ 7 tips.

00:00 - Intro
00:30 - Don't Send Your Scouts Wandering Aimlessly Into The Civ 7 Fog
01:05 - Don't Forget to Raise Your Civ 7 Settlement Cap
01:32 - Don't Neglect Civ 7 Resources
01:55 - Don't Get Landlocked
02:24 - Don't Let Your Lands Get Ransacked by Hostile Independent People
03:34 - Use Your Civ 7 Commanders
04:10 - Heal and Upgrade Your Civ 7 Units
04:48 - Repair Your Districts With Civ 7 Gold
05:23 - Don't Lock Yourself Out Of Unique Quarters
05:44 - Don't Use Up All Your Civ 7 Influence
05:57 - Check You're Not Falling Behind
06:09 - Don't Forget To Set Up Civ 7 Trade Routes
06:24 - Keep an Eye On Civ 7 Age Progress
07:16 - Don't Neglect Your Civ 7 Military

description:

title: Civ 7 With Mods is AWESOME! 7 Game Changing Mods! [Install Guide]
description:
Civ 7's UI isn't great. Firaxis is working on it, but you can make it better TODAY by installing mods! This How-To video guide will teach you where to find mods, provide some tips, explain how to install them, and suggest some mods to try out.

Mods give you more info to work with and greatly increase quality of life by reducing the number of clicks needed to get invaluable info to base your decisions on, and to make it easier crush your enemies, see them driven before you, and... well, you know the rest.



This channel is focused on single-player PC gaming exclusively! Reviews, upcoming games, and more! Escape the console wars, "cinematic" 30 FPS slideshows, and the battle pass infested MTX hellscape that multiplayer gaming has become.

I tend to focus on narrative and story focused games, especially when there's a focus on characters. RPGs and walking simulators are in my wheelhouse. I enjoy a number of other genres: FPS, turn-based strategy, 4X, grand strategy, roguelikes, deckbuilders, and puzzle games.

Have something you'd like me to make a video on? Don't hesitate to ask for it in the comments!

Like, subscribe, and hit the notification bell to stay updated on all the latest single player PC gaming!

Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/@Podosniper?sub_confirmation=1

Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/podosniper.com

title: CIvilization 7 - Han China - Main Theme - Synthesia Piano Tutorial
description:
Watch my latest piano arrangement(cover) for Han China theme from Civilization 7! 

"The Han was not the first of China's ancient dynasties, but was arguably its grandest. From Liu Bang's rebellion against the iron-fisted Qin came a balance between centralized authority and Confucian meritocracy, and a wave of innovation in statecraft, philosophy, and science. With an army of shi dafu, scholar-bureaucrats, at home and an army of chariots, heavy infantry, and crossbows abroad, for four hundred years the Han held the Mandate of Heaven."

Composed & Conducted by Geoff Knorr
Performed by Bei Bei Monter, Zhiming Shu, & Ashley Jarmack

📹 *Suggestons* *for* *new* *videos:*
